subject: Re: [junit] Location of the reults in an .XML format

If you run your JUnit tests under Ant using the JUnit task you can
supply a nested element to indicate you want to use the xml formatter:

  <formatter type="xml"/>

The documentation is available here:

http://ant.apache.org/manual/OptionalTasks/junit.html#nested

Jtf

On 2/25/07, eran_nelinger <eran_nelinger@...> wrote:
> Hey,
>
> I'm using "confluence" as a tool to display Junit test results.
> In order to get the results I need to give the location of the .XML
> file that stores the results of the tests.
> I would be happy to get some information regarding where the junit
> stores the results file.
>
> Thanks in advance,
> Eran
>
